itemrec.name: Item Recommendation Engine
itemrec.description:
Recommend interesting items to each user personally.

Sample Use Cases

  • recommend top N items to users personally
  • predict users' future preferences
  • help users to discover new topics they may be interested in
  • personalize content
  • optimize sales

numRecommendations.description: Number of recommendations to be generated for each user

paramsections.name: Recommendation Preferences
paramsections.description: You could adjust the following parameters using the sliders. Higher value means more important to your App.

subsections.name: Unseen Items Only
subsections.description: Should the system recommend items that users have seen before?

paramsections.name: Recommendation Goal
paramsections.description: Please define the goal to be maximized. Algorithms will be evaluated based on the goal defined here.

itemsim.name: Item Similarity Engine
itemsim.description:
Discover similar items.

Sample Use Cases

  • predict what else would a user like if this user likes a, i.e. "People who like this also like...."
  • automatic item grouping

numSimilarItems.description: Number of similar items to be generated for each item.

paramsections.name: Prediction Preferences
paramsections.description: You could adjust the following parameters using the sliders. Higher value means more important to your App.

paramsections.name: Prediction Goal
paramsections.description: Please define the goal to be maximized. Algorithms will be evaluated based on the goal defined here.

pdio-knnitembased.name: kNN Item Based Collaborative Filtering
pdio-knnitembased.description: This item-based k-NearestNeighbor algorithm predicts user preferences based on previous behaviors of users on similar items.
datareq: Users, Items, and U2I Actions such as Like, Conversion and Rate.

minNumRatedSimParam.name: Minimum Number of Rated Similar Items

selections.name: Use the highest preference score one
Use the lowest preference score one

subsections.name: Regularization
subsections.description: Add virtual item pairs that have zero correlation. This helps avoid noise if some item pairs have very few user actions in common.

subsections.name: Other Parameters
subsections.description: Filters to speed up computation and reduce noise.

subsections.name: User Action Scores
subsections.description: Define the preference score represented by each user action from 1 to 5. 5 is the most preferred, 1 is the least preferred. 3 is neutral.

subsections.name: Overriding
subsections.description: When there are conflicting actions, e.g. a user gives an item a rating 5 but later dislikes it, determine which action will be considered as final preference.

mahout-itembased.name: Mahout's Threshold Item Based Collaborative Filtering
mahout-itembased.description: Predicts user preferences based on previous behaviors of users on similar items.
datareq: Users, Items, and U2I Actions such as Like, Conversion and Rate.

booleanData.name: Boolean Data
booleanData.description: Treat input data as having no preference values.

maxPrefsPerUser.name: Max Num of Preferences per User
maxPrefsPerUser.description: Maximum number of preferences considered per user in final recommendation phase.

minPrefsPerUser.name: Min Num of Preferences per User
minPrefsPerUser.description: Ignore users with less preferences than this.

maxSimilaritiesPerItem.name: Max Num of Similarities per Item
maxSimilaritiesPerItem.description: Maximum number of similarities considered per item.

maxPrefsPerUserInItemSimilarity.name: Max Num of Preferences per User in Item Similarity
maxPrefsPerUserInItemSimilarity.description: Max number of preferences to consider per user in the item similarity computation phase, users with more preferences will be sampled down.

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.description: Discard item pairs with a similarity value below this.

selections.name: Use the highest preference score one
Use the lowest preference score one

subsections.name: User Action Scores
subsections.description: Define the preference score represented by each user action from 1 to 5. 5 is the most preferred, 1 is the least preferred. 3 is neutral.

subsections.name: Overriding
subsections.description: When there are conflicting actions, e.g. a user gives an item a rating 5 but later dislikes it, determine which action will be considered as final preference.

mahout-parallelals.name: Mahout's Parallel ALS-WR
mahout-parallelals.description: Predicts user preferences based on previous behaviors of users.
datareq: Users, Items, and U2I Actions such as Like, Conversion and Rate.

implicitFeedback.name: Implicit Feedback
implicitFeedback.description: Whether data consists of implicit data.

alpha.name: Alpha
alpha.description: Confidence parameter will be ignored if Implicit Feedback is false.

numFeatures.name: Number of Factorized Features
numFeatures.description: Dimension of the factorized feature space.

selections.name: Use the highest preference score one
Use the lowest preference score one

subsections.name: User Action Scores
subsections.description: Define the preference score represented by each user action from 1 to 5. 5 is the most preferred, 1 is the least preferred. 3 is neutral.

subsections.name: Overriding
subsections.description: When there are conflicting actions, e.g. a user gives an item a rating 5 but later dislikes it, determine which action will be considered as final preference.

mahout-knnuserbased.name: Mahout's kNN User Based Collaborative Filtering (Non-distributed)
mahout-knnuserbased.description: Predicts user preferences based on previous behaviors of users who are the k-nearest neighbors (Non-distributed).
datareq: Users, Items, and U2I Actions such as Like, Conversion and Rate.

booleanData.name: Boolean Data
booleanData.description: Treat input data as having no preference values.

nearestN.name: Nearest K
nearestN.description: K-nearest neighbors to a given user.

weighted.name: Weighted
weighted.description: The Similarity score is weighted (only applied to Euclidean Distance, Pearson Correlation, Uncentered Cosine user similarity).

samplingRate.name: Sampling Rate
samplingRate.description: Must be greater > 0 and <= 1. Percentage of users to consider when building neighborhood. Decrease to trade quality for performance.

selections.name: Use the highest preference score one
Use the lowest preference score one

subsections.name: User Action Scores
subsections.description: Define the preference score represented by each user action from 1 to 5. 5 is the most preferred, 1 is the least preferred. 3 is neutral.

subsections.name: Overriding
subsections.description: When there are conflicting actions, e.g. a user gives an item a rating 5 but later dislikes it, determine which action will be considered as final preference.

mahout-thresholduserbased.name: Mahout's Threshold User Based Collaborative Filtering (Non-distributed)
mahout-thresholduserbased.description: Predicts user preferences based on previous behaviors of users whose similarity meets or exceeds a certain threshold (Non-distributed).
datareq: Users, Items, and U2I Actions such as Like, Conversion and Rate.

booleanData.name: Boolean Data
booleanData.description: Treat input data as having no preference values.

weighted.name: Weighted
weighted.description: The Similarity score is weighted (only applied to Euclidean Distance, Pearson Correlation, Uncentered Cosine user similarity).

samplingRate.name: Sampling Rate
samplingRate.description: Must be greater > 0 and <= 1. Percentage of users to consider when building neighborhood. Decrease to trade quality for performance.

selections.name: Use the highest preference score one

subsections.description: When there are conflicting actions, e.g. a user gives an item a rating 5 but later dislikes it, determine which action will be considered as final preference.

mahout-slopeone.name: Mahout's SlopeOne Rating Based Collaborative Filtering (Non-distributed)
mahout-slopeone.description: Predicts user preferences based on average difference in preference values between new items and the items for which the user has indicated preferences (Non-distributed).
datareq: Users, Items, and U2I Actions such as Like, Conversion and Rate.

trainingtestsplit.name: Training/Test Data Splitter With Time Order Option

timeorder.description: Random with Time Order means that data in Test Set is always newer than those in Train Set.

ismap_k.description: Item Similarity Mean Average Precision at k
